pages.text: $(thing)Momos$() are timid creatures found on the $(thing)Tropic Zones$() of the $(thing)Misty World$(), with a tendency to flee from humans.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Momo$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.$(br2)They can be tamed and bred using $(item)Cup Mushrooms$(), requiring $(thing)Taming level 1$(). Once tamed, they can be saddled and led using a $(item)Cup Mushroom on a Stick$().

pages.name: Momo
pages.drop1: mist:meat_food:2{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 0-1", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill", "Cooks if killed while on Fire"]}}
pages.drop2: minecraft:leather{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 0-1", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill"]}}
pages.drop3: minecraft:bone{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 0-3", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill"]}}
